title: Physiotherapy Exams
description:
The Physiotherapy Exams Android app, meticulously designed to cater to all types of Physiotherapy examinations. This incredibly useful app is tailored for various Central & State Government hospital exams, including RML Hospital, Safdarjung Hospital, All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), DSSSB, and BECIL Physiotherapy Exams.

Furthermore, the app comprehensively encompasses an extensive array of both national and international recruitment Physiotherapy exams, ensuring its users are fully prepared for success. These include prominent exams like National Physical Therapy Examination (NPTE) and Physiotherapy Competency Exam (PCE), as well as other significant assessments like HCPC, APC Exam, PBNE and HPCSA. Additionally, the app caters to various specialized exams like Singapore Physiotherapy Association (SPA) Registration Examination, Dubai Health Authority, JIPMER Exam, Lady Hardings Medical/ Kalawati Saran Children's Hospital, PGI Chandigarh, MPT Exams and numerous others, providing a comprehensive and indispensable resource for Physiotherapy professionals worldwide.

Features:

✅︎	Physiotherapy Test Series 
✅︎	Integrated with AI 
✅︎	Subject & Lesson-wise Physiotherapy Bullets
✅︎	Subject & Lesson-wise Pocket Notes
✅︎	Quizzes to evaluate your knowledge
✅︎	Leader Board of Top 100 students
✅︎	Physiotherapy Old Exam Questions
✅︎	Save any Question feature
✅︎	Review later any Question feature
✅︎	Regular updates with new questions and notes
✅︎	Physiotherapy Exam Preparation
✅︎	Profile Photo change facility
✅︎	Offline support.


Subjects covered:

•	Anatomy 
•	Physiology
•	Exercise Therapy 
•	Electrotherapy [PAMS] 
•	Pediatric Physiotherapy
•	Neurological Physiotherapy
•	Biomechanics & Kinesiology 
•	Obstetrics and Gynaecology
•	Medical & Surgical Conditions
•	Community Based Rehabilitation
•	Cardiovascular & Pulmonary Rehabilitation 
•	Orthopaedics & Sports Rehabilitation 
•	Nutrition
•	Microbiology & Biochemistry
•	Computers in Physiotherapy 
•	Biostatistics & Research
•	General Knowledge
•	English Language skills
•	Arithmetical Ability skills
•	Reasoning Skills

We have structured the Physiotherapy course into individual subjects, covering Anatomy, Physiology, Cardiovascular & Pulmonary Rehabilitation, Orthopaedics & Sports Rehabilitation, Pediatric Physiotherapy, Neurological Physiotherapy and Obstetrics and Gynecology.

This application is continually updated with fresh content on a daily basis. We have also integrated quizzes within the app to evaluate your performance. Our aim is that this app proves invaluable in preparing for Physiotherapy competitions. We kindly request you to share your experience after using the app.

summary: Introducing Physiotherapy Exams - For Worldwide PT Licensure & Recruitment Exams
